price: 84. En laat mij door de volgende generaties in eerbaarheid herinnerd worden;
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
